attributes.action: enhance fathers rights to be able to seek representation in family disputes
attributes.additional_details: to reduce men’s mental health/male suicides related to fathers that are stopped contact or wrongly accused any person must be entitled to defend themselves if they are lied about and also it has potential of being a good cause due to more children being at a good emotional state and well being ; will reduce mental health issues overall and potentially get people off medications and back into work building the community as a whole and reinforcing unity in the United Kingdom and fair society.
attributes.background: I would like parliament to consider boosting fathers rights to be made in equality to women’s rights to representation in family court disputes in the UK

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

More legal aid for fathers seeking access to their children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725169
